name: Canvas Component Select

movements.name: Select

beats.title: Show Selection
beats.scenario: Render or Display show Selection Overlay
beats.userStory: As a runtime engineer, I need `showSelectionOverlay` to render selection affordances and register handlers.
beats.testCase: getCanvasRect returns patched bounding client rect values

then: overlay appears within ≤ 30ms and aligns within ≤ 1px

beats.title: Notify UI
beats.scenario: Publish UI State Change Notifications to Event System
beats.userStory: As an orchestrator, I need `notifyUi` to publish selection events with <20ms delivery.

then: an event is sent to EventRouter within 5ms with item IDs
and: delivery is FIFO with no drops or duplicates

beats.title: Publish Selection Changed
beats.scenario: Publish or Deploy publish Selection Changed
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want publishSelectionChanged to execute reliably with latency < 1 minute so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).
beats.testCase: publishes canvas.component.selection.changed when publishSelectionChanged handler is called

then: a domain event with before/after snapshots is emitted

movements.userStory: As an interaction designer, I need selection to highlight target nodes, attach overlays, and notify control panel within ≤100ms P95.
movements.businessValue: Improves page load time by 25%; enables smooth visual transitions; supports responsive design; maintains 60fps
